titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: IMPROVING ACCESS TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPIES ACTIVITY SUSPENSION IDENTIFIER - Description

div.p: IMPROVING ACCESS TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPIES ACTIVITY SUSPENSION IDENTIFIER is the same as attribute ACTIVITY SUSPENSION IDENTIFIER for the Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Data Set.
IMPROVING ACCESS TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPIES ACTIVITY SUSPENSION IDENTIFIER is:
used to uniquely identify the period of PATIENT initiated ACTIVITY SUSPENSION
is locally generated and does not need to be sequential.
See the NHS Digital website at: Improving Access to Psychological Therapies Data Set for details of how this identifier is generated.
